## NonInviteServerTransaction.receiveResponse() method

Receive responses from TU for this transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
receiveResponse(statusCode: number, response: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  statusCode | <code>number</code> | Status code of repsonse. 101-199 not allowed per RFC 4320. |
|  response | <code>string</code> | Response to send. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
